Crowdsource answers to subjective questions

Truecoin enables anyone to get honest predictions of interesting and otherwise unanswerable questions such as how to price, review, and compare products.

Get paid to provide your predictions

Truecoin rewards predictors who participate using an innovative cryptocurrency (TRC). The currency facilitates the creation of new questions on the Truecoin platform.

Help grow a public collection of truthful, human-generated datasets

Each prediction settles publicly on the Ethereum blockchain. With that, we intend to curate truthful human-generated datasets for advanced artificial intelligence applications involving reputation, recognition, and more.
